title: Chapter 1204 - That Su Guy’S Cheating!
body:
Chapter 1204 - That Su Guy’S Cheating!

The middle-aged man was called Xue Changjing.

Just as Su Yi had guessed, he was from the Church of the River of Stars, and he presided over their Celestial Palace.

He’d guessed Su Yi’s identity at a glance because of his age and cultivation base. Su Yi was just too young, just a little over twenty, but his cultivation was in the Profound Unity Realm!

Even out amongst the stars, such a young Emperor was a rare, unparalleled monster, the type that might not appear once in tens of thousands of years, a dazzling genius.

And before coming to the Wilds, Xue Changjing had heard that the Temple Master’s reincarnation was extremely young. That was how he figured out who Su Yi was.

“Those who’ve lived a long time are indeed more perceptive than others,” sighed Su Yi.

Xue Changjing’s eyes flashed, and he smiled, but it didn’t reach his eyes. “Should I call you ‘Temple Master’ or Su Xuanjun?”

“It makes no difference,” said Su Yi. He put his hands behind his back and gazed at the hundred and eight stars hovering beneath the distant skies. “You can continue your trial. I promise not to get in your way.”

Xue Changjing believed him; the Temple Master had always been a man...
